text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: —— It's really starting to come together now. At this rate, I think we can successfully perform the abridged version for the ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's call it a day for now. Tomorrow, we'll continue with full rehearsals, so give it your best.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: The steps… angle of arms…! Down to my fingertips…!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Oh, there you are, Kawakami. Were you here all night long……? She seems really focused… I guess I shouldn't disturb her.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hm…… Seems like she's pretty worked up. … Well, I understand the sentiment though.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah… I mean, she's filling in for someone she always admired, of course she's pumped up. —— We should also put in more effort!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I agree. Can't lose to Kawaka— Ah, right! Do you think there could be materials from past Votive Stage Plays lying around? It could really help us with our acting!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hmm～ This is a script for a different play… And this one's… I'm not quite sure! ……Ah, I wonder what this disc is for.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: It says "Shirabyōshi"! It might be a past video!! Let's take a look!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: ………… Ah, I knew it! This is the Votive Stage Play ——

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: —— Wait! Prez!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Wow! What is this, what is this?! The president's in it!! Why?! And on top of that, this is… a butterfly costume!!!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh!? So, are we playing the same role!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, the lines… They're the same, but… Did this scene always have such intense energy and impactful movements……?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Wow… It's divine, mysterious, mesmerizing… It's so… butterfly-like……

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: ……… So cool.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: …… That was incredible, the atmosphere in the venue. I mean, you can even feel it from the footage… It's like there's something touching me deep in my heart……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: ———— Ah!! I see, so what the president told me the other day was about this…!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh, what are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: So, I went shopping with the president a little while ago. On the way back home ——

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: We were just talking about how it's almost time for the Festival of Illustrious Equines.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: She said the Festival of Illustrious Equines is a very meaningful event to horsegirls, so they put a lot of effort into its management.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: That by having the next generation understand and carry on its rituals, she hopes the Festival of Illustrious Equines, which prays for all horsegirls' futures, continues to be lively.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Particularly this year, because Tracen Academy is responsible for a significant ritual, she's eager to give it her all, and she has high hopes as well……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Maybe it's because the president has personally participated in the ceremony before… That's why she has a strong desire to pass it on……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I see… Yeah, I think so too. It's something special to Prez…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: …… Wait. Are you going behind my back, Tsuru!? Doing things like shopping together and having important conversations! That's not fair!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Whaaaa～!? I didn't mean for it to happen that way, it was pure coincidence! We just happened to bump into each other at the shopping district!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: …… But honestly, now that I think about it, I'm glad we did. I got to hear her story.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: —— I want to carry on that legacy. If someone is going to keep the President's vision alive, I'd like to be that person.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I definitely want to do the Votive Stage Play ——

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: —— In "traditional" form……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: O mighty and revered three pillars, witness my dance till its end…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: My essence carries my mentor's legacy and the solemnity of the pillars. I am the vessel of ancestral wisdom, pledging to prolong their esteemed heritage——!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ugh…! My footwork still needs a lot of improvement…! Madam King, on the other hand, moves so naturally, just like flowing water……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ………Take a half step back right here… then pivot. Keep my gaze focused… mind my elbow placement, and fingertips………

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Half step back, pivot, focused gaze, elbows, fingertips… Half step back, pivot, focused gaze, elbows, fingertips……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Alright! Once more, from the start! O mighty and revered three pillars ——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Draw near, draw near, heed the resolve I have set in my heart…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That girl, still practicing at this hour………

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (Despite the burden I've put on her, she remains so focused… That kid's got real determination. I'm sure she'll pull through again…)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I'm sure……… She will……
